TEXT.English: All leaders start with the Insane trait
TEXT.French: All leaders start with the Insane trait
TEXT.German: All leaders start with the Insane trait
TEXT.Italian: All leaders start with the Insane trait
TEXT.Spanish: Todos los líderes comienzan con la habilidad Demente

TEXT.English: Disables the Guild of the Nine
TEXT.French: Disables the Guild of the Nine
TEXT.German: Disables the Guild of the Nine
TEXT.Italian: Disables the Guild of the Nine
TEXT.Spanish: Deshabilita el Gremio de los Nueve

TEXT.English: All leaders start with two or three traits, chosen randomly
TEXT.French: All leaders start with two or three traits, chosen randomly
TEXT.German: All leaders start with two or three traits, chosen randomly
TEXT.Italian: All leaders start with two or three traits, chosen randomly
TEXT.Spanish: Todos los líderes comienzan con dos o tres habilidades, elegidas aleatoriamente
